descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][font=Times New Roman][size=3][size=4][b][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59085-1-1413392179.jpg[/img]
This MOD adds a stand-alone vampire followers of two people.
 (However, they do not have a characteristic face like other vampires.
  Their faces, are based on the Brynjolf and Serana of "GCE NPCs Peplacer" of another MOD of me.)[/b] [/size][/size]
 
 [color=#e06666][size=4][b]This MOD is DLC1 Dawnguard required![/b][/size][/color]
 
 [size=3]As the ability of the vampire, they are in possession of the ability of the following in common. 
[size=2]  >Weakness to Sunlight
  >Resist Poison 100％
  >Resist Disease 100％
  >Weakness to Fire 50％
  >Resist Frost　30％[/size][/size]
 
 [color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b][Requirements][/b][/size][/color]
  > Skyrim Ver 1.9.32.0+
  > DLC1 Dawnguard
  > graphics settings Medium+ or
     Setting to "iTexMipMapSkip=0" in "SkyrimPrefs.ini"
 
[[color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b]Installation][/b][/size][/color]
 > The installation of this MOD recommends NMM or Mod Organizer.
 > This MOD is being offered by the Fomod Installer. it is possible to choose body type from UNP, CBBE, seveNBase.

[color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b][Recommended Mods][/b][/size][/color]
  Any of the follower overhaul mods.
  Female Facial Animation by nao4288  [color=#e06666](This is very important!)[/color]
  Face Light by tktk [color=#e06666] (Strongly recommended!)[/color]
  I use The AIR ENB to take screenshots.

[color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b][Character][/b][/size][/color]
  [color=#ea9999][size=4][b]Liselotte
 [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59085-1-1413393202.jpg[/img][/b][/size][/color]
  Location : Nightgate Inn
  Class : Vampire 
  Skill : One-Handed, Light-armor, Conjuration, Destruction
  Spells : Bats, IceVolley, Summon-Gargoyle, Vampiric Drain

  [color=#ea9999][size=4][b]Ferdinand
 [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59085-2-1413393202.jpg[/img][/b][/size][/color]
  Location : Nightgate Inn
  Class : Vampire 
  Skill : One-Handed(Dual), Light-armor, Conjuration
  Spells : Frostbite, Spectral Arrow, Summon-Bone man, Bound Sword,Vampiric Drain
